data.description: an XS interface to Thai word segment. Lib
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Thai word segmentation is a big problem of Thai lanaguage analysis.
    There are many researches on it. I've found a project in
    sourceforge(http://thaiwordseg.sourceforge.net/) release a C-library
    that work well. So I create a XS interface to it, pack to a module
    called Lingua::TH::Segmentation. At first, I've just registered a
    name(String::Thai::Segmentation), but after someone in the news
    group suggest me that my modules is for single language and should
    lead with Lingua, and TH is the code name of my country from
    ISO-xxxx, I do agree with him. Sorry for submit more than once. :)
